nodes.text: Casus Belli 66 was a French roleplaying magazine from November of 1991. It contained many roleplaying articles, including three adventures for the West End Games Star Wars D6 system. The articles were called "Le dieu mort" (in English "The dead God"), "Dans la nuit des temps" ("In the mists of time") and "Le Trésor oublié" ("The forgotten Treasure"), all written by Jean Balczesak.
